services.title: Service A
services.description:
I will draw a small portrait (yes I do pet portraits as well!)
or a design of your choice rendered in pencil, fully shaded.
OR any design of your choice. Dimensions range from 5x7 to
8x10. Background elements = extra charge.

services.title: Service B
services.description:
I will create a small colored pencil portrait (yes I do pet
portraits as well)! OR any design of your choice. Dimensions
range from 5x7 to 8x10. Background elements = extra charge.

services.title: Service C
services.description:
I will create a small watercolor portrait (yes I do pet
portraits as well!) OR any design of your choice. Dimensions
range from 5x7 to 8x10. Background elements = extra charge.

services.title: Service D
services.description:
I will do small to large scale paintings periodically. Message
me or email @SkyleeLPerkins@gmail.com to inquire about price,
duration, and subject matter.
